frame.name: Adaptive Frame
frame.description: A well-rounded grip, reliable and sturdy.

perks.description:
Lightly vented barrel.
  •  Greatly controls recoil
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Arrowhead Brake

perks.description:
Stable barrel attachment.
  •  Increases stability
  •  Moderately controls recoil
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Chambered Compensator

perks.description:
Balanced barrel. 
  •  Slightly increases range and stability
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Corkscrew Rifling

perks.description:
Weighty barrel extension.
  •  Increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed
  •  Moderately controls recoil
perks.name: Extended Barrel

perks.description:
Ultra-light barrel. 
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Fluted Barrel

perks.description:
Barrel optimized for distance.
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Decreases stability
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Full Bore

perks.description:
Durable ranged barrel.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Hammer-Forged Rifling

perks.description:
Barrel optimized for recoil reduction.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Polygonal Rifling

perks.description:
Dual strength barrel.
  •  Increases range
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Smallbore

perks.description:
Speeds up charge.
  •  Faster charge time
  •  Decreases impact damage
perks.name: Accelerated Coils

perks.description:
Strong battery life.
  •  Increases magazine size
perks.name: Enhanced Battery

perks.description:
Large heavy battery.
  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed
perks.name: Ionized Battery

perks.description:
Slower-building charge for higher damage.
  •  Increases impact damage
  •  Slower charge time
perks.name: Liquid Coils

perks.description:
Constrains recoil for every bolt.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Particle Repeater

perks.description:
Distance optimizations.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Projection Fuse

perks.description: Sliding partially reloads this weapon's magazine and temporarily boosts range and stability.
perks.name: Slideshot

perks.description: Overflows the magazine based on the number of rapid kills before reloading.
perks.name: Ambitious Assassin

perks.description: Increases handling, reload speed, and stability for each fully charged ability.
perks.name: Surplus

perks.description: Increases accuracy, stability, and precision hit targeting when firing from the hip.
perks.name: Hip-Fire Grip

perks.description: Melee final blows reload this weapon's magazine from reserves.
perks.name: Grave Robber

perks.description: The holstered weapon is automatically reloaded after a short period of time.
perks.name: Auto-Loading Holster

perks.description: Final blows grant increased mobility, weapon range, and handling for a short duration.
perks.name: Killing Wind

perks.description: Each rapid kill with this weapon progressively increases reload speed for a short time.
perks.name: Feeding Frenzy

perks.description: Sliding partially reloads this weapon's magazine and temporarily boosts handling and stability.
perks.name: Slideways

perks.description: Improved stability and accuracy as the magazine gets lower.
perks.name: Under Pressure

perks.description: This weapon can be drawn unbelievably fast.
perks.name: Quickdraw

perks.description: Increased accuracy, stability, and handling when firing while crouched.
perks.name: Firmly Planted

perks.description: This weapon gains increased damage from melee kills and kills with this weapon.
perks.name: Swashbuckler

perks.description: Hitting three separate targets increases damage for a moderate duration.
perks.name: One for All

perks.description: Kills with this weapon generate ability energy. This energy is divided between your uncharged abilities.
perks.name: Wellspring

perks.description: Reloading grants increased damage based on the number of rapid kills made beforehand.
perks.name: Multikill Clip

perks.description: Killing combatants with this weapon generates a small amount of Super energy.
perks.name: Thresh

perks.description: Rapidly defeating targets triggers health regeneration. Guardians and powerful combatants count as more than one kill.
perks.name: Unrelenting

perks.description: Grants a short period of increased stability and accuracy on initial trigger pull.
perks.name: Tap the Trigger

perks.description: Breaking an enemy's shield with this weapon makes them more vulnerable to Kinetic damage for a brief period.
perks.name: Disruption Break

perks.description: Kills with this weapon generate grenade energy. Activating your grenade ability reloads this weapon from reserves.
perks.name: Demolitionist

perks.description: Reloading after a kill grants increased damage.
perks.name: Kill Clip

perks.description: Grants reduced charge time and increased handling speed for a short time immediately after swapping to this weapon.
perks.name: Backup Plan

perks.description: Rounds at the end of the magazine deal more damage.
perks.name: High-Impact Reserves
